markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Webslinger](/Feats.aspx?ID=2775) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Anadi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=255" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 104 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per 10 minutes

</column>

---

Your natural ability to create silken webs blends with your magical powers, allowing you to create impossibly large webs with great frequency. This has the effects of a 2nd-level [_web_](/Spells.aspx?ID=374) spell using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.
name: Webslinger
